slides.title: Asking questions
list: Great for getting quick answers to difficult questions (the first answer was posted 11 minutes after I asked the question)
Asking the question can help you discover the answer (rubber ducky debugging)

slides.title: Answering questions
list: Writing a lot improves written communication
A good showcase of your technical knowledge
Good rep effectively makes you a moderator
It's nice to help people solve their problems

slides.title: Jon Skeet, king of Stack Overflow
The dark side
list: It can get a bit addictive
The idiots wanting quick answers (plz send teh codez) get annoying
